changeSet.author: amirkovic
changeSet.sql: create sequence person_seq; create table if not exists person ( id bigint not null constraint person_pkey primary key, address varchar(255), city varchar(255), country_for_taxation varchar(255), country_of_residence varchar(255), email varchar(255), first_name varchar(255), last_name varchar(255), phone_number varchar(255), profile_picture_url varchar(255) ); create index if not exists person_uk_on_email on person (email);
